name: The Power House
description:
Hey rookie, welcome to the Power House. This is a joyless 1st person gravity bending  puzzle game.  Since you're the new guy, it's your tedious  job to head into the basement to turn the power back on, but don't worry, you get to use the gravitational bending powers of the GRAV gun.

Move - WASD

Jump - SPACE

Shoot Grav Balls - Left Click

Destroy Grav Balls - Right Click
